info.title: Hijrah App API
info.description: Complete API documentation for Hijrah App - A comprehensive assessment and program management system

post.description: Register a new user account

message.example: Registration successful. Please verify your account.

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password
Authenticate user using Firebase ID token
Authenticate user using Google OAuth access token
Complete user registration after initial signup
Verify OTP code for account verification
Resend OTP code for account verification
Send OTP email for password reset

message.example: Reset code sent to your email

post.description: Verify OTP code for password reset
Set new password after OTP verification
Create a new user account (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users (Admin only)
Retrieve programs suggested for the authenticated user
Retrieve programs that the authenticated user has interacted with, along with their status
Retrieve detailed information about a specific program

post.description: Start a program for the authenticated user. Creates a user-program relationship with 'in_progress' status.

400.description: Program not found or already started

message.example: Program not found or already started

post.description: Mark a program as completed for the authenticated user. Updates the user-program relationship status to 'completed'.

400.description: Program not found or not in progress

message.example: Program not found or not in progress

get.description: Retrieve all steps for a specific program
Retrieve detailed information about a specific step

post.description: Start a step for the authenticated user. Creates step progress tracking with 'in_progress' status.
Complete a step with type-specific data. Journal steps require 'thought', Quiz steps require 'score', Challenge steps require 'challenges_done' and 'percentage'.

requestBody.description: Step completion data (varies by step type)

post.description: Update the progress of challenge-type steps by tracking individual challenges completed. Automatically calculates percentage based on total challenges and sets step to 'in_progress' status.

parameters.name: stepId
parameters.description: Step ID (must be a challenge-type step)

400.description: Invalid step type or other error

message.example: Invalid step type for challenge progress

challenges_done: The challenges done field is required.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all active methodologies
Retrieve detailed information about a specific methodology
Retrieve methodology information for a specific section (for two-section methodologies)
Retrieve detailed information about a specific pillar within a methodology
Retrieve detailed information about a specific module within a methodology
Retrieve detailed information about a specific module within a pillar and methodology

404.description: Methodology, pillar, or module not found

get.description: Retrieve all questions for a specific methodology
Retrieve all questions for a specific pillar within a methodology
Retrieve all questions for a specific module within a methodology
Retrieve all questions for a specific module within a pillar and methodology

404.description: Methodology, pillar, or module not found

get.description: Retrieve user answers for a methodology assessment

404.description: Methodology not found or no answers submitted

post.description: Submit user answers for a methodology assessment

get.description: Retrieve user answers for a pillar assessment

404.description: Methodology, pillar not found or no answers submitted

post.description: Submit user answers for a pillar assessment

get.description: Retrieve user answers for a module assessment

404.description: Methodology, module not found or no answers submitted

post.description: Submit user answers for a module assessment

get.description: Retrieve user answers for a module within a pillar assessment

404.description: Methodology, pillar, module not found or no answers submitted

post.description: Submit user answers for a module within a pillar assessment

404.description: Methodology, pillar, or module not found

success.description:
API Schemas for Hijrah App

This file contains all OpenAPI schema definitions for requests and responses
used throughout the Hijrah App API documentation.

// ==================== COMMON SCHEMAS ====================

message.example: Registration successful. Please verify your account.

definition.example: A structured approach to evaluating digital maturity

objectives.example: Assess current state and identify improvement opportunities

definition.example: Evaluates cloud adoption and management capabilities

objectives.example: Assess cloud readiness and optimization opportunities

definition.example: A structured learning and assessment program

objectives.example: Develop digital capabilities and assess progress

objectives_count_by_type.description: Count of objectives grouped by type

text.example: How would you rate your current cloud infrastructure?

content.example: Updated article content or mission description

description.example: Updated detailed description of the objective

content.example: Article content in HTML or Markdown format...
Complete your morning routine and reflect on your goals

questions.description: Array of question IDs from the question bank

description.example: Comprehensive guide to the subject matter

UpdateProgramRequest.description: Request schema for updating a program

objective_ids.description: Array of objective IDs in the desired order

status.description: User's progress status for this program

started_at.description: When the user started this program

completed_at.description: When the user completed this program

description.example: Write about your day and experiences

thought.example: Today I learned about patience and resilience

thought.description: Reflection text for journal step completion
thought.example: Today I reflected on my spiritual journey and realized the importance of consistency in my daily practices.

challenges_done.description: Number of challenges completed so far

bearerAuth.description: Use a bearer token to access this endpoint
bearerAuth.name: Authorization

tags.name: User Answers
tags.description: Submit and retrieve user answers for assessments

tags.name: Programs
tags.description: Program progress and step management endpoints
